message:
We have added a new session in day 2 specially for those who love to innovate with hardware like micro-controllers & Arduino

check the event & specially day 2 to get introduced to Arduino & Embedded Linux Systems that give you unlimited possibilities for innovation ;)

Day 2 [April 29th]: Introduction to Arduino & Embedded Linux, Installing Ubuntu’s latest release (12.04 / Precise Pangolin), hands-on with the release’s features, discussing alternatives to our most used applications.
